pr_title: DHFPROD-5531: Adding e2e test for mapping and load steps having custom Hook

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5531: Adding e2e test for mapping and load steps having custom Hook

timeline.bodyText:
can we pls add .should('be.visible') to all the four cy.contains()
I could be wrong, but I think, contains is a query and doesnt assert, so these steps might not fail if there is no mappedOrderDate or primaryKey in the DOM.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: cy.contains() will fail if the element is not found.
replies.author: brucean52
